system:

deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_BUTTON_I
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_item_i.xmlEV_ITEM_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_i.xmlEV_PICK_AND_DROPABLE_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_textable_i.xmlEV_TEXTABLE_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_tooltipable_i.xmlEV_TOOLTIPABLE_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_sensitive_i.xmlEV_SENSITIVE_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_dockable_source_i.xmlEV_DOCKABLE_SOURCE_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_action_sequences_i.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_BUTTON_ACTION_SEQUENCES_I
feature -- Access
f_gray_pixmap../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_gray_pixmapgray_pixmap: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Image displayed on Current. deferred end
feature -- Element change
f_set_gray_pixmap../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_set_gray_pixmapset_gray_pixmap (a_gray_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP) -- Assign a_gray_pixmap to ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_gray_pixmapgray_pixmap. require gray_pixmap_not_void: a_gray_pixmap /= Void deferred end
f_remove_gray_pixmap../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_remove_gray_pixmapremove_gray_pixmap -- Make ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap Void. deferred end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_update_for_pick_and_drop../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_update_for_pick_and_dropupdate_for_pick_and_drop (starting: FalseBOOLEAN) -- Pick and drop status has changed so update appearance of -- Current to reflect available targets. do if starting then if ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_is_sensitiveis_sensitive and then attached ../implementation_interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_i.xml#f_application_implementationapplication_implementation.../implementation_interface/ev_application_i.xml#f_pick_and_drop_sourcepick_and_drop_source as l_pnd_source and then attached l_pnd_source.../implementation_interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_i.xml#f_pebblepebble as l_pebble and then not ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xml#f_attached_interfaceattached_interface.../interface/ev_pick_and_dropable_action_sequences.xml#f_drop_actionsdrop_actions.../interface/ev_pnd_action_sequence.xml#f_accepts_pebbleaccepts_pebble (l_pebble) then ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_enabled_beforeenabled_before := True ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_disable_sensitivedisable_sensitive end else if ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_enabled_beforeenabled_before then ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_enabled_beforeenabled_before := False ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_enable_sensitiveenable_sensitive end end end
f_is_sensitive../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_is_sensitiveis_sensitive: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current sensitive? deferred end
feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_enabled_before../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_enabled_beforeenabled_before: FalseBOOLEAN -- Was Current enabled before ../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_update_for_pick_and_dropupdate_for_pick_and_drop modified -- the current state.
f_enable_sensitive../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_enable_sensitiveenable_sensitive -- Enable Current. deferred end
f_disable_sensitive../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_disable_sensitivedisable_sensitive -- Disable Current. deferred end
f_parent_is_sensitive../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_parent_is_sensitiveparent_is_sensitive: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is ../implementation_interface/ev_item_i.xml#f_parentparent sensitive? deferred end
f_has_parent../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_has_parenthas_parent: FalseBOOLEAN -- Is Current parented? deferred end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_tool_bar_button_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_tool_bar_button.xmlEV_TOOL_BAR_BUTTON note option: stable attribute end
